column5: Headed over to Kincardine today to see if they needed help at the Scales, they didn't lake was rough & getting rougher, there were a few Donated Trout & Salmon for the Fish Fry & Al Wilkins came along & fillet them for the Fish Fry on Aug 11 from 4:00 until 9:00 come on out & help raise some money for the Clubs Hatchery expenses, there are 50/50 tickets on sail also for $2.00 or 3 for $5.00 at the Derby Weigh Stations.<br style="font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica; font-size: 10px; ">Thanx & Tight Lines Richard
